oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Woman's a Fool
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: African Americans--Performances & portrayals; Motion Pictures; Woodcuts (prints);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color one sheet (red and black on white) advertising the Black film featurette Woman's a Fool with Ida Cox and Ardella. Poster was possibly designed by Hatch Show Print. Poster features a woodcut of a nude woman, which could be a Hatch derivative of movie artwork that would have been supplied by a movie theater or studio.
